org.bytedeco.dnnl

Class primitive_desc_base

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.dnnl.dnnl_primitive_desc_handle
        • org.bytedeco.dnnl.primitive_desc_base
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    concat.primitive_desc, primitive_desc, reorder.primitive_desc, sum.primitive_desc

    @Namespace(value="dnnl")
 @Properties(inherit=dnnl.class)
public class primitive_desc_base
extends dnnl_primitive_desc_handle
    \} dnnl_api_attributes

    \addtogroup dnnl_api_primitives_common \{

    Base class for all primitive descriptors.

      • query_md

        @ByVal
public memory.desc query_md(dnnl.query what,
                                    int idx)
        Returns a memory descriptor. \note There are convenience methods #dnnl::primitive_desc_base::src_desc(), #dnnl::primitive_desc_base::dst_desc(), and others.
        Parameters:
        what - The kind of parameter to query; can be #dnnl::query::src_md, #dnnl::query::dst_md, etc.
        idx - Index of the parameter. For example, convolution bias can be queried with what = #dnnl::query::weights_md and idx = 1.
        Returns:
        The requested memory descriptor.

      • query_md

        @ByVal
public memory.desc query_md(dnnl.query what)
